title: Advanced Thinking and Social Relationship Analysis Skills Development Course Using Business Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic business concepts and foundational awareness of hierarchical structures and social relationships within organizations, along with cultural sensitivity toward diverse backgrounds
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based online environments for entry-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields. Includes game content reflecting interdisciplinary collaboration scenarios, cultural differences, and historical contexts. Focuses on strengthening global citizenship competencies.

learning_goals: Learners improve critical thinking and problem-solving skills by ≥30% through business simulation games, analyzing stakeholder conflict management strategies and evaluating social relational dynamics.
Learners demonstrate creative strategy development via in-game collaborative activities and experience decision-making processes considering team dynamics and cultural contexts.

Learners derive actionable strategic insights from simulation results applicable to real work environments, develop implementation plans accounting for organizational power structures and cultural contexts, and incorporate civic responsibility.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
